education.universityPara: Program focuses on installing, configuring, and troubleshooting workstations and server computers, networks, and virtual infrastructure. Practical work is completed on industry-standard hardware and software encountered in the workplace.

previousEducation.universityPara: Completed courses in Digital and Analog Electronics, Embedded Systems, Software, Signal Processing, Communication Systems, Math, and Physics. Project-based learning with hands-on skill development and exposure to engineering environments and processes.
